resources.string: " CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS circle_operator (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number INTEGER, operator TEXT, circle TEXT) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS circles (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, code TEXT, desc TEXT) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS operators (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, code TEXT, name TEXT, company TEXT) "

" INSERT INTO circles (id, code, desc) VALUES (1, 'AP', 'Andhra Pradesh Telecom Circle.'), (2, 'AS', 'Assam Telecom Circle.'), (3, 'BR', 'Bihar & Jharkhand Telecom Circle.'), (4, 'CH', 'Chennai Metro Telecom Circle (includes Chennai, MEPZ & Mahabalipuram).'), (5, 'DL', 'Delhi Metro Telecom Circle (includes NCR, Faridabad, Ghaziabad, Gurgaon & Noida).'), (6, 'GJ', 'Gujarat Telecom Circle (includes Daman & Diu, Dadra & Nagar Haveli).'), (7, 'HP', 'Himachal Pradesh Telecom Circle.'), (8, 'HR', 'Haryana Telecom Circle (excludes Faridabad, Gurgaon & Panchkula).'), (9, 'JK', 'Jammu & Kashmir Telecom Circle.'), (10, 'KL', 'Kerala Telecom Circle (includes Lakshadeep).'), (11, 'KA', 'Karnataka Telecom Circle.'), (12, 'KO', 'Kolkata Metro Telecom Circle (includes parts of Haora, Hooghly, North & South 24 Parganas and Nadia Districts).'), (13, 'MH', 'Maharashtra Telecom Circle (includes Goa but excludes Mumbai, Navi Mumbai & Kalyan).'), (14, 'MP', 'Madhya Pradesh & Chhattisgarh Telecom Circle.'), (15, 'MU', 'Mumbai Metro Telecom Circle (includes Navi Mumbai & Kalyan)'), (16, 'NE', 'North East India Telecom Circle (includes Arunachal Pradesh, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Manipur and Tripura).'), (17, 'OR', 'Orissa Telecom Circle.'), (18, 'PB', 'Punjab Telecom Circle (includes Chandigarh & Panchkula).'), (19, 'RJ', 'Rajasthan Telecom Circle.'), (20, 'TN', 'Tamil Nadu Telecom Circle (excludes CH Chennai, MEPZ, Mahabalipuram & Minjur and includes Pondicherry except Yanam & Mahe).'), (21, 'UE', 'Uttar Pradesh (East) Telecom Circle.'), (22, 'UW', 'Uttar Pradesh (West) & Uttarakhand Telecom Circle (excludes Ghaziabad & Noida).'), (23, 'WB', 'West Bengal Telecom Circle (includes Andaman & Nicobar,Sikkim excludes Calcutta Telecom District).'), (24, 'ZZ', 'Customer Care (All Over India).') "
" DROP TABLE IF NOT EXISTS circle_operator DROP TABLE IF NOT EXISTS circles DROP TABLE IF NOT EXISTS operators "
